description.value: As a Free Action, the Sister can spend a Fate Point to increase the penetration of their weapon by their Insanity Bonus until the end of the next turn.

system.benefit: As a Free Action, the Sister can spend a Fate Point to increase the penetration of their weapon by their Insanity Bonus until the end of the next turn.

prerequisites.text: Tier 2: Sister of Battle E.Adv, Insanity 25+, Furious Zeal.
